snippet: More than 600 people were under investigation for posing as I.R.S. officers and sending text messages to American cellphone numbers demanding money....
lead_paragraph: More than 600 people were under investigation for posing as I.R.S. officers and sending text messages to American cellphone numbers demanding money.

headline.main: Call Centers in India Posed as I.R.S. to Cheat U.S. Taxpayers, Authorities Say
headline.print_headline: Police in India Arrest Dozens Posing as I.R.S. in Phone Scam
